title: Maruti Swift
intro: The Maruti Swift is a modern hatchback with a sporty design that is fun to drive. It has many contemporary features and an adequately spacious cabin and offers high mileage thanks to its efficient petrol engine.

summary.question: Latest Update
summary.answer: Maruti Suzuki has revised the prices for select models. The Grand Vitara and Swift have become dearer by up to Rs.25,000.

summary.question: Price
summary.answer: Maruti Swift price ranges between Rs. 7.28 Lakh - Rs. 10.88 Lakh depending on the variant selected.

summary.question: When was the Maruti Swift launched?
summary.answer: The updated Swift was launched in India on 1 April, 2023.

summary.question: What variants does it get?
summary.answer: The Maruti Swift is available in four variants – LXi, VXi, ZXi, and ZXi+.

summary.question: What features are available in the Maruti Swift?
summary.answer: Exterior highlights of the Swift include LED DRLs, LED headlamps, 15-inch dual-tone alloy wheels, LED tail lights, fog lights, blacked-out ORVMs, C-pillar-mounted rear door handles, a rear wiper and washer, a conventional antenna, and an optional blacked-out roof. Inside, the hatchback gets features in the form of cruise control, an idle start-stop function, a SmartPlay Studio touchscreen infotainment system, steering-mounted controls, keyless entry, an engine start-stop button, dual airbags, ABS with EBD, and a reverse parking camera. The model has a seating capacity of five occupants.

summary.question: What are the engine, performance, and specifications of the Maruti Swift?
summary.answer: The Swift is powered by the K12 series Dual Jet, Dual VVT engine that is tuned to generate an output of 89bhp and 113Nm of torque, and comes paired with a five-speed manual unit or an AMT unit. This motor has been updated and now complies with the latest emission norms

summary.question: Is the Maruti Swift a safe car?
summary.answer: The Swift hatchback has scored a one-star safety rating in the Global NCAP crash test.

summary.question: What are the rivals to the Maruti Swift?
summary.answer: Rivals to the Swift include the Hyundai Grand i10 Nios, Tata Tigor, and Renault Triber.

pros: Fun to drive - Hatchback dimensions, light steering/controls, nimble road manners
Powerful engine - The Petrol motor is flexible, peppy, refined and fuel-efficient
Fairly spacious - By hatchback standards, one won't be left wanting for more space
Sporty design - It’s still one of the most stylish-looking hatchbacks in our country
Aftersales experience - Excellent service network and ready availability of spares
cons: Lacks modern features - Maruti could have offered new-age gizmos to delight buyers
Build quality - Lower cabin looks ordinary due to the 'average' plastic quality
Firm slow-speed ride quality - One can also hear the suspension working underneath

verdict: What makes the Maruti Suzuki Swift such a fascinating proposition is that it's not only sporty to drive and look at, but also offers reasonable rear-seat space and equipment. All this makes it a genuinely comfortable family hatch for the masses.

price.question: What is the on road price of Maruti Suzuki Swift base model?
price.answer: The on-road price of Maruti Suzuki Swift base model is Rs. 5.99 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 24808, insurance premium of Rs. 32817 and additional charges of Rs. 2000.

price.question: What is the on road price of Maruti Suzuki Swift top model?
price.answer: The on-road price of Maruti Suzuki Swift top model is Rs. 9.03 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 64040, insurance premium of Rs. 42088 and additional charges of Rs. 2000.

performance.question: What is the real world versus claimed mileage of Maruti Suzuki Swift?
performance.answer: The company claimed mileage of Maruti Suzuki Swift is 22.38 to 30.9 kmpl. As per users, the mileage came to be 0 to 20.8 kmpl in the real world.

specifications.question: What is the seating capacity in Maruti Suzuki Swift?
specifications.answer: Maruti Suzuki Swift has a seating capacity of 5 people.

specifications.question: What are the dimensions of Maruti Suzuki Swift?
specifications.answer: The dimensions of Maruti Suzuki Swift include its length of 3845 mm, width of 1735 mm and height of 1530 mm. The wheelbase of the Maruti Suzuki Swift is 2450 mm.

features.question: Is Maruti Suzuki Swift available in 4x4 version?
features.answer: No, Maruti Suzuki Swift doesn't come with four wheel drive option.

safety.question: How many airbags does Maruti Suzuki Swift get?
safety.answer: The top Model of Maruti Suzuki Swift has 2 airbags. The Swift has driver and passenger airbags.

safety.question: Does Maruti Suzuki Swift get ABS?
safety.answer: Yes, all versions of Maruti Suzuki Swift have ABS. ABS is a great accident prevention technology, allowing drivers to steer while braking hard.

title: Maruti Invicto
intro: The Invicto is the largest, the most premium and the most expensive vehicle Maruti Suzuki has ever sold. It's based on the Toyota Innova Hycross and follows the same principles, offering lots of space, features and a comfortable ride. The Invicto's interior lacks the premium look and feel its high price demands although you still get the same Toyota-developed hybrid system which makes it incredibly fuel efficient.

pros: Wheelbase/width translates into ample room. Immensely practical, well put together.
Large well-cushioned seats that have a high commanding view of the exteriors.
Has a lower price tag and shorter waiting periods than the Toyota Hycross.
Well-tuned suspension creates a pliant ride quality even over broken roads.
With both motors working together, overall performance is good.
cons: The lower price is owing to a downsized feature list over the Toyota Hycross.
Smaller wheels and tyres can make the Invicto look less attractive in profile.
Maruti Suzuki does not sell its Invicto with a diesel powertrain option.

verdict: The Maruti Invicto can be the better choice over the Toyota Innova Hycross if one isn't keen on waiting extensively for delivery, is bent on buying a hybrid from the Maruti stable, is more price conscious and is content with a shorter feature list.

price.question: What is the on road price of Maruti Suzuki Invicto base model?
price.answer: The on-road price of Maruti Suzuki Invicto base model is Rs. 24.79 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 251130, insurance premium of Rs. 97286 and additional charges of Rs. 2200.

price.question: What is the on road price of Maruti Suzuki Invicto  top model?
price.answer: The on-road price of Maruti Suzuki Invicto top model is Rs. 28.42 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 287430, insurance premium of Rs. 104236 and additional charges of Rs. 2200.

performance.question: What is the real world versus claimed mileage of Maruti Suzuki Invicto ?
performance.answer: The company claimed mileage of Maruti Suzuki Invicto is 23.24 kmpl. As per users, the mileage came to be 20 kmpl in the real world.

specifications.question: What is the seating capacity in Maruti Suzuki Invicto ?
specifications.answer: Maruti Suzuki Swift has a seating capacity of 7 people.

specifications.question: What are the dimensions of Maruti Suzuki Invicto ?
specifications.answer: The dimensions of Maruti Suzuki Invicto include its length of 4755 mm, width of 1845 mm and height of 1795 mm. The wheelbase of the Maruti Suzuki Invicto is 2850 mm.

features.question: Is Maruti Suzuki Invicto available in 4x4 version?
features.answer: No, Maruti Suzuki Invicto doesn't come with four wheel drive option.

safety.question: How many airbags does Maruti Suzuki Invicto get?
safety.answer: The top Model of Maruti Suzuki Invicto has 6 airbags. The Invicto has driver, front passenger, 2 curtain, driver side and front passenger side airbags.

safety.question: Does Maruti Suzuki Invicto get ABS?
safety.answer: Yes, all versions of Maruti Suzuki Invicto have ABS. ABS is a great accident prevention technology, allowing drivers to steer while braking hard.

title: Maruti Brezza
intro: The Brezza, a compact SUV, has fairly good quality and road presence. It has a lot of feel-good features, a spacious and comfortable cabin for five passengers and a large boot. Its petrol engine is fuel efficient, and the ride is stable and absorbent.
keyfeatures: ARKAMYS Surround Sense System with wireless Android Auto and Apple CarPlay
Fast charging USB -Type A and C (Rear)

pros: Lots of features - Gets a slew of notable features that add convenience
Interior space - The cabin feels airy with ample storage spaces all over
Tall seating - Offers a commanding driving position with good outward visibility
Ease of driving - Light controls and the compact proportions make it nimble
Service network - Is backed by Maruti Suzuki's exhaustive and robust network
cons: Engine lacks punch - The mid-range grunt could have been more exciting
Pricey - Top-end variants are expensive when stacked against segment rivals
Ride quality at slow speeds - Conspicuous vertical movement over broken roads

verdict: The new Maruti Brezza has made considerable progress over the previous version. It now gets a nearly all-new design, comes equipped with a range of new features, packs a fairly good ride quality, and is more than just convenient to drive when you are running around the urban jungle.

price.question: What is the on road price of Maruti Suzuki Brezza base model?
price.answer: The on-road price of Maruti Suzuki Brezza base model is Rs. 8.29 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 58860, insurance premium of Rs. 38800 and additional charges of Rs. 2000.

price.question: What is the on road price of Maruti Suzuki Brezza top model?
price.answer: The on-road price of Maruti Suzuki Brezza top model is Rs. 14.14 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 142230, insurance premium of Rs. 56100 and additional charges of Rs. 2000.

performance.question: What is the real world versus claimed mileage of Maruti Suzuki Brezza?
performance.answer: The company claimed mileage of Maruti Suzuki Brezza is 17.38 to 25.51 kmpl. As per users, the mileage came to be 0 to 19.45 kmpl in the real world.

specifications.question: What is the seating capacity in Maruti Suzuki Brezza?
specifications.answer: Maruti Suzuki Brezza has a seating capacity of 5 people.

specifications.question: What are the dimensions of Maruti Suzuki Brezza?
specifications.answer: The dimensions of Maruti Suzuki Brezza include its length of 3995 mm, width of 1790 mm and height of 1685 mm. The wheelbase of the Maruti Suzuki Brezza is 2500 mm.

features.question: Does Maruti Suzuki Brezza get a sunroof?
features.answer: Yes, 10 out of 15 versions of Maruti Suzuki Brezza have Sunroof.

features.question: Does Maruti Suzuki Brezza have cruise control?
features.answer: Yes, 10 out of 15 versions of Maruti Suzuki Brezza have cruise control function. With the Cruise control enabled you can take your foot off the accelerator and move at a fixed speed constantly provided the road system permits this.

safety.question: How many airbags does Maruti Brezza Swift get?
safety.answer: The top Model of Maruti Suzuki Brezza has 6 airbags. The Brezza has driver, front passenger, 2 curtain, driver side and front passenger side airbags.

safety.question: Does Maruti Suzuki Brezza get ABS?
safety.answer: Yes, all versions of Maruti Suzuki Brezza have ABS. ABS is a great accident prevention technology, allowing drivers to steer while braking hard.

title: Maruti Fronx
intro: The Fronx is an attractive and spacious crossover based on the Baleno, boasting a long list of features. Its engines are efficient and sufficiently powerful, available with both AMT and torque converter options. The ride is accomplished, with adequate ground clearance.
intro_hindi: फ्रॉन्क्स एक आकर्षक और विशाल क्रॉसओवर है जो बलेनो पर आधारित है, और इसमें सुविधाओं की एक लंबी सूची है। इसके इंजन कुशल और पर्याप्त शक्तिशाली हैं, जो एएमटी और टॉर्क कन्वर्टर दोनों विकल्पों में उपलब्ध हैं। इसका सवारी अनुभव उत्कृष्ट है और ग्राउंड क्लीयरेंस पर्याप्त है।
keyfeatures: ARKAMYS Premium Sound System with wireless Android Auto and Apple CarPlay
Fast USB Charging Sockets -Type A and C (Rear)
keyfeatures_hindi: ARKAMYS प्रीमियम साउंड सिस्टम विथ वायरलेस एंड्रॉइड ऑटो और एप्पल कारप्ले
फास्ट यूएसबी चार्जिंग सॉकेट्स - टाइप ए और सी (रियर)

pros: SUV appearance - Looks refreshingly different despite being based on the Baleno
Features - Plonking for the top-end variant will get you all the new-age features
Strong engines - Adequately powerful drivetrains with reasonably good drivability
Ride - The Fronx feels comfortable as it irons out the road irregularities quite well
Service - Maruti Suzuki cars are backed-up by the brand's exhaustive and robust network
pros_hindi: एसयूवी लुक - बलेनो पर आधारित होने के बावजूद अलग और ताजा दिखता है
सुविधाएं - टॉप-एंड वेरिएंट में सभी आधुनिक सुविधाएं मिलती हैं
मजबूत इंजन - पर्याप्त शक्तिशाली और उपयोगी ड्राइवट्रेन
सवारी - फ्रॉन्क्स सड़कों की असमानताओं को आराम से दूर करता है
सेवा - मारुति सुजुकी की विस्तृत और मजबूत नेटवर्क द्वारा समर्थित
cons: Low-end torque - The 1-litre powertrain on the Fronx has some turbo lag below 2,500rpm
SUV space - One would expect more cabin space over the Baleno, the car it is based on
Driver posture - Being an SUV, it needs a higher driving position/more rear headroom
cons_hindi: लो-एंड टॉर्क - फ्रॉन्क्स का 1-लीटर पावरट्रेन 2,500rpm से कम पर कुछ टर्बो लैग दिखाता है
एसयूवी स्पेस - बलेनो के मुकाबले अधिक केबिन स्पेस की अपेक्षा थी
ड्राइवर पोजिशन - एसयूवी होते हुए भी ड्राइविंग पोजिशन अधिक और रियर हेडरूम बेहतर होनी चाहिए

verdict: Designed to plug the gap between the Baleno and Brezza, the new Fronx has quite a lot going for it. Namely the stance, a long list of features, a mature ride and a refined set of capable motors. Yet another winner from Maruti!
verdict_hindi: बलेनो और ब्रेज़ा के बीच के अंतर को भरने के लिए डिज़ाइन किया गया, नया फ्रॉन्क्स अपने स्टांस, सुविधाओं की लंबी सूची, परिपक्व सवारी और सक्षम इंजन के साथ उत्कृष्ट प्रदर्शन करता है। मारुति की एक और सफलता!

price.question: What is the on road price of Maruti Suzuki Fronx base model?
price.question_hindi: मारुति सुजुकी फ्रॉन्क्स बेस मॉडल की ऑन रोड कीमत क्या है?
price.answer: The on-road price of Maruti Suzuki Fronx base model is Rs. 7.47 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 53085, insurance premium of Rs. 48599 and additional charges of Rs. 2200.
price.answer_hindi: मारुति सुजुकी फ्रॉन्क्स बेस मॉडल की ऑन-रोड कीमत रु. 7.47 लाख है, जिसमें रु. 53,085 का पंजीकरण शुल्क, रु. 48,599 का बीमा प्रीमियम और रु. 2200 के अतिरिक्त शुल्क शामिल हैं।

price.question: What is the on road price of Maruti Suzuki Fronx top model?
price.question_hindi: मारुति सुजुकी फ्रॉन्क्स टॉप मॉडल की ऑन रोड कीमत क्या है?
price.answer: The on-road price of Maruti Suzuki Fronx top model is Rs. 13.14 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 132180, insurance premium of Rs. 67712 and additional charges of Rs. 2200.
price.answer_hindi: मारुति सुजुकी फ्रॉन्क्स टॉप मॉडल की ऑन-रोड कीमत रु. 13.14 लाख है, जिसमें रु. 1,32,180 का पंजीकरण शुल्क, रु. 67,712 का बीमा प्रीमियम और रु. 2200 के अतिरिक्त शुल्क शामिल हैं।

performance.question: What is the real world versus claimed mileage of Maruti Suzuki Fronx?
performance.question_hindi: मारुति सुजुकी फ्रॉन्क्स की वास्तविक और दावा की गई माइलेज में क्या अंतर है?
performance.answer: The company claimed mileage of Maruti Suzuki Fronx is 20.01 to 24.48 kmpl. As per users, the mileage came to be 0 to 19.4 kmpl in the real world.
performance.answer_hindi: कंपनी ने मारुति सुजुकी फ्रॉन्क्स की माइलेज 20.01 से 24.48 किमी/लीटर होने का दावा किया है। उपयोगकर्ताओं के अनुसार, वास्तविक माइलेज 0 से 19.4 किमी/लीटर तक रही।

specifications.question: What is the seating capacity in Maruti Suzuki Fronx?
specifications.question_hindi: मारुति सुजुकी फ्रॉन्क्स में बैठने की क्षमता कितनी है?
specifications.answer: Maruti Suzuki Fronx has a seating capacity of 5 people.
specifications.answer_hindi: मारुति सुजुकी फ्रॉन्क्स में 5 लोगों की बैठने की क्षमता है।

specifications.question: What are the dimensions of Maruti Suzuki Fronx?
specifications.question_hindi: मारुति सुजुकी फ्रॉन्क्स के आयाम क्या हैं?
specifications.answer: The dimensions of Maruti Suzuki Fronx include its length of 3995 mm, width of 1765 mm and height of 1550 mm. The wheelbase of the Maruti Suzuki Fronx is 2520 mm.
specifications.answer_hindi: मारुति सुजुकी फ्रॉन्क्स के आयाम 3995 मिमी लंबाई, 1765 मिमी चौड़ाई और 1550 मिमी ऊंचाई हैं। इसका व्हीलबेस 2520 मिमी है।

features.question: Does Maruti Suzuki Fronx get a sunroof?
features.question_hindi: क्या मारुति सुजुकी फ्रॉन्क्स में सनरूफ है?
features.answer: No, Maruti Suzuki Fronx doesn't have a sunroof.
features.answer_hindi: नहीं, मारुति सुजुकी फ्रॉन्क्स में सनरूफ नहीं है।

features.question: Does Maruti Suzuki Brezza have cruise control?
features.question_hindi: क्या मारुति सुजुकी ब्रेज़ा में क्रूज कंट्रोल है?
features.answer: Yes, 4 out of 14 versions of Maruti Suzuki Fronx have cruise control function. With the Cruise control enabled you can take your foot off the accelerator and move at a fixed speed constantly provided the road system permits this.
features.answer_hindi: हां, मारुति सुजुकी फ्रॉन्क्स के 14 में से 4 वेरिएंट में क्रूज कंट्रोल फंक्शन है। क्रूज कंट्रोल चालू होने पर, आप एक्सीलेटर से पैर हटा सकते हैं और सड़क की अनुमति के अनुसार एक निश्चित गति पर चल सकते हैं।

safety.question: How many airbags does Maruti Suzuki Fronx get?
safety.question_hindi: मारुति सुजुकी फ्रॉन्क्स में कितने एयरबैग हैं?
safety.answer: The top Model of Maruti Suzuki Fronx has 6 airbags. The Fronx has driver, front passenger, 2 curtain, driver side and front passenger side airbags.
safety.answer_hindi: मारुति सुजुकी फ्रॉन्क्स के टॉप मॉडल में 6 एयरबैग हैं। इसमें ड्राइवर, फ्रंट पैसेंजर, 2 पर्दे, ड्राइवर साइड और फ्रंट पैसेंजर साइड एयरबैग शामिल हैं।

safety.question: Does Maruti Suzuki Fronx get ABS?
safety.question_hindi: क्या मारुति सुजुकी फ्रॉन्क्स में एबीएस है?
safety.answer: Yes, all versions of Maruti Suzuki Fronx have ABS. ABS is a great accident prevention technology, allowing drivers to steer while braking hard.
safety.answer_hindi: हां, मारुति सुजुकी फ्रॉन्क्स के सभी वेरिएंट में एबीएस है। एबीएस एक बेहतरीन दुर्घटना रोकथाम तकनीक है जो ड्राइवर को तेज ब्रेकिंग के दौरान स्टीयरिंग करने में मदद करती है।

title: Hyundai Venue
intro: The Venue, a compact SUV renowned for its feature-rich variants, offers three fuel-efficient engines and five gearbox options. It has the signature Hyundai quality, attractive design, and space to comfortably seat four occupants.
keyfeatures: ARKAMYS Surround Sense System with wireless Android Auto and Apple CarPlay
Fast charging USB -Type A and C (Rear)

pros: Lots of features - Gets a slew of notable features that add convenience
Interior space - The cabin feels airy with ample storage spaces all over
Tall seating - Offers a commanding driving position with good outward visibility
Ease of driving - Light controls and the compact proportions make it nimble
Service network - Is backed by Maruti Suzuki's exhaustive and robust network
cons: Engine lacks punch - The mid-range grunt could have been more exciting
Pricey - Top-end variants are expensive when stacked against segment rivals
Ride quality at slow speeds - Conspicuous vertical movement over broken roads

verdict: The new Maruti Brezza has made considerable progress over the previous version. It now gets a nearly all-new design, comes equipped with a range of new features, packs a fairly good ride quality, and is more than just convenient to drive when you are running around the urban jungle.

title: Hyundai Exter
intro: The Exter, a micro crossover, offers the form factor of an SUV for the price of a hatchback. Its tall-boy design enhances cabin space and the boot is quite large, too. The Exter’s USP includes paddle shifters for the AMT version and a sunroof.

pros: This Hyundai is feature loaded, there are many segment first features
Safety net of six airbags comes as standard in the Exter
Its easy to drive owing to the user-friendly driving controls
Superb AMT calibration, there are no AMT jerks at sedate driving
You will appreciate the Exter's spacious and practical cabin
cons: The Exter's radical design can be discouraging for some buyers
The Hyundai Exter is not the fun-to-drive car one would expect to be
The range-topping version can be quite expensive to buy

verdict: The Exter is a well thought out all-around product. Be it its price, features, space utilisation, quality levels, ergonomics and ease of driving. If one can get over the radical looks, this is one to plonk for.

price.question: What is the on road price of Hyundai Exter  base model?
price.answer: The on-road price of Hyundai Exter base model is Rs. 6.00 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 28996, insurance premium of Rs. 36101 and additional charges of Rs. 2000.

price.question: What is the on road price of Hyundai Exter top model?
price.answer: The on-road price of Hyundai Exter top model is Rs. 10.10 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 108999, insurance premium of Rs. 51193 and additional charges of Rs. 2000.

performance.question: What is the real world versus claimed mileage of Hyundai Exter?
performance.answer: The company claimed mileage of Hyundai Exter is 19.2 to 27.1 kmpl. As per users, the mileage came to be 18.33 to 26 kmpl in the real world.

specifications.question: What is the seating capacity in Hyundai Exter?

title: Tata Harrier
intro: The Harrier is a sturdy and imposing SUV, built on a Land Rover platform, and boasts a five-star safety rating. Its spacious and comfortable cabin is replete with tech, features, and a big boot. Driving it is an engaging experience thanks to a potent engine and well-balanced handling.
keyfeatures: Tilt and telescopic adjustable steering wheel
Dual function DRLs with turn indicators
Wireless Android Auto and Apple CarPlay
Leather wrapped steering wheel and gear knob

pros: BS6 Phase 2 - RDE compliant, ADAS functions, updated infotainment/instrument console
Powerful motor - It's a quick SUV with refined manners and very little NVH
Automatic gearbox - It provides a smooth power delivery with seamless shifts
Comfortable cabin - There are acres of space with large well-cushioned seats
Storage spaces - Lots of space to stash one's stuff on the dash, doors and armrests
cons: Quality isn't consistent - Some sections feel inferior in terms of quality and fit/finish
Taut ride - The ride quality when driving at slow speeds can feel slightly firm
Centre-console storage - Storing items here is not an easy affair and requires effort

verdict: The Tata Harrier is certainly a looker. And that combined with the Land Rover-derived underpinnings, dynamics, spacious interiors and a long equipment list, makes for a potent package overall.

title: Mahindra Scorpio
intro: The Mahindra Scorpio, unlike the Scorpio Classic, is a more luxurious, full-size three-row SUV that still exudes a rugged charm. It offers a dominant presence on the road, ample space in the first two rows, and a plethora of features. It's good for city and highway driving with big engines, smooth automatic transmissions, and an absorbent ride.
keyfeatures: Seating configurations - 7/9 seater with captain chair

pros: Visibility - Tall seating position, unintrusive pillars and large unhindered glass area
Tough build quality - Sturdy/robust, built like it will stand the test of time
Engine - The mHawk 130 diesel motor offers solid drivability/frugality
Rugged nature - The ladder on frame chassis can take on any terrain effortlessly
Mahindra service - Owners get a nationwide extensive sales, spares and service network
cons: Fit/finish - Not up to segment standards, awry ergonomics since it isn't user friendly
Unsorted ride quality - It feels bumpy and not entirely settled at higher speeds
Outdated looks - The design is still an unmistakable embodiment of the first iteration

verdict: For those who prefer the older Scorpio over the new 'N', the brand has kept things rolling with the latest Scorpio Classic.

title: Toyota Innova Crysta
intro: The Innova Crysta is a modern-day multi-purpose vehicle with bulletproof reliability, strong chassis, and an efficient but powerful diesel engine. The Crysta also offers a large cabin, seating for up to eight people, and plenty of storage options.

summary.question: Latest Update
summary.answer: The GX Plus variant fills in above the GX variant and is priced Rs 1.3 lakh above the latter

summary.question: Price
summary.answer: Toyota Innova Crysta price ranges between Rs. 25.05 Lakh - Rs. 33.10 Lakh depending on the variant selected.

summary.question: When was the 2023 Toyota Innova Crysta launched?
summary.answer: The updated Innova Crysta was launched in India on 2 May.

summary.question: What variants does it get?
summary.answer: The 2023 Innova Crysta is offered in four variants: G, GX, VX, and ZX.

summary.question: What features are available in the 2023 Toyota Innova Crysta?
summary.answer: On the outside, the 2023 Innova Crysta gets a tweaked front face with more chrome highlights. The front grille gets a horizontal chrome stripe, while the bumper gets a chrome insert on the chin and around the fog lamp housing. Also up for offer is a black insert between the tail lights.

summary.question: What are the engine, performance, and specifications of the 2023 Toyota Innova Crysta?
summary.answer: At the heart of the facelifted Innova Crysta is a 2.4-litre diesel engine generating a maximum power output of 148bhp and 343Nm of torque. This motor is mated exclusively to a five-speed manual transmission.

summary.question: Is the 2023 Toyota Innova Crysta a safe car?
summary.answer: The Toyota Innova Crysta scored a four-star rating in the ASEAN NCAP crash test.

summary.question: What are the rivals to the 2023 Toyota Innova Crysta?
summary.answer: The Toyota Innova Crysta facelift rivals the Mahindra XUV700, Tata Safari, Hyundai Alcazar, Kia Carens, and MG Hector Plus.

pros: Bulletproof reliability
Spacious, comfortable seats with sensible adjustability.
Adequate grunt throughout the rev range.
Scores high in terms of overall practicality.
Dependable sales/service/resale
cons: Not equipped with modern features.
Boot space when all seats are in use.
Expensive to buy.

verdict: People swear by the Toyota Innova Crysta. And that's for a reason. Be it the spacious and practical cabin, rock-solid reliability or an unreal resale value.

specifications.answer: Skoda Slavia? has a seating capacity of 5 people.

specifications.question: What are the dimensions of Skoda Slavia?
specifications.answer: The dimensions of Skoda Slavia include its length of 4541 mm, width of 1752 mm and height of 1507 mm. The wheelbase of the Skoda Slavia is 2651 mm.

features.question: Does Skoda Slavia get a sunroof?
features.answer: Yes, 13 out of 20 variants of Skoda Slavia have Sunroof.

features.question: Does Skoda Slavia have cruise control?
features.answer: Yes, 19 out of 20 variants of Skoda Slavia have cruise control function. With the Cruise control enabled you can take your foot off the accelerator and move at a fixed speed constantly provided the road system permits this.

safety.question: How many airbags does Skoda Slavia get?
safety.answer: The top Model of Skoda Slavia has 6 airbags. The Exter has driver, front passenger, 2 curtain, driver side and front passenger side airbags.

safety.question: Does Skoda Slavia get ABS?
safety.answer: Yes, all versions of Skoda Slavia have ABS. ABS is a great accident prevention technology, allowing drivers to steer while braking hard.

title: Volkswagen Virtus
intro: The Volkswagen Virtus offers a spacious cabin, comfortable interior with ample legroom, and modern features like a large infotainment and powered and ventilated front seats. It boasts excellent fuel efficiency, safety features, reliability, and a smooth driving experience.

pros: 2023 model update - Added feature, the powertrains are now BS6 Phase 2/RDE compliant
Easy to drive - The powertrains provide adequate pep/a smooth drive for regular drives
Spacious/comfortable - Big car visuals translate into roomy interiors, large boot
Mature ride quality - The ride too impresses with its absorbent and settled quality
Sorted steering - Predictable/linear steering response, the reasonably quick turn-in
cons: Fit and finish - VW needs to up the quality, and fit and finish game in a few areas
Driver information system - The DIS could do with a better interface to aid operability
Its a sedan - Virtus comes at a time when SUV sales are going through the roof

verdict: The 2023 Volkswagen Virtus is a well-rounded car. Agreed, it needs to up the quality, plus fit and finish in a few areas. However, on other counts, there’s very little to complain about. It not only drives and rides well, but it’s also well-specced.

price.question: What is the on road price of Volkswagen Virtus base model?
price.answer: The on road price of Volkswagen Virtus base model is Rs. 14.42 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 219118, insurance premium of Rs. 50348 and additional charges of Rs. 2100.

price.answer: The on road price of Volkswagen Virtus top model is Rs. 24.18 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 367248, insurance premium of Rs. 86120 and additional charges of Rs. 2100.

safety.answer: Yes, all versions of Volkswagen Virtus have ABS. ABS is a great accident prevention technology, allowing drivers to steer while braking hard.

title: MG Hector
intro: The MG Hector is a stylish and spacious SUV that offers a comfortable ride with its plush interior. It boasts a large touchscreen infotainment system with connected features, ADAS functionality, and a powerful engine line-up, delivering a smooth and enjoyable driving experience.

pros: Features and ADAS functions are appealing.
Bold and commanding road stance.
Roomy, easy access, large glass area.
Refined drivetrains with sufficient power.
Ideal long-distance cruiser.
cons: Touchscreen operation is distracting for the driver.
Body motion at highway speeds.
Not exciting to drive overall.

verdict: In the little time that the MG Hector has spent in our market, it has undoubtedly proved its mettle. Now, with the latest updates and ADAS enhancements, this MG continues to excel as a package.

title: Renault Kwid
intro: The Kwid impresses with its SUV-inspired looks and ample ground clearance, paired with an absorbent ride. It offers reasonable tech and features, along with its small size, light controls, adequate power, and AMT convenience, making driving effortless.

pros: 2023 update - BS6 phase 2 (RDE) compliance, extra safety kit as standard, more features
Easy to drive - Armed with a light steering/clutch, reasonably smooth gear shifter
Absorbent ride quality - Equipped with long-travel shock absorbers tuned to be soft
Compact footprint - Tight overall dimensions help with constraints to park/navigate
Powertrain options – Two small capacity frugal motors with manual/AMT gearboxes
cons: Strict four-seater - Being compact, only 2 adults can be seated comfortably at the rear
Not dynamically sorted - Slow steering, lots of up and down movement at higher speeds
Quality - Inconsistent levels of quality, fit and finish are below expectations

price.question: What is the on road price of Renault Kwid base model?
price.answer: The on road price of Renault Kwid base model is Rs. 5.64 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 57455, insurance premium of Rs. 35160 and additional charges of Rs. 2000.

price.answer: The on road price of Renault Kwid top model is Rs. 7.68 Lakh which includes a registration cost of Rs. 77482, insurance premium of Rs. 44476 and additional charges of Rs. 2000.

performance.question: What is the real world versus claimed mileage of Renault Kwid?
performance.answer: The company claimed mileage of Renault Kwid is 21.7 to 22 kmpl, while when CarWale experts tested it, they found the mileage to be 16.83 kmpl in city and 21.6 kmpl on highways. As per users, the mileage came to be 21.5 kmpl in the real world.

specifications.question: What is the seating capacity in Renault Kwid?
specifications.answer: Renault Kwid has a seating capacity of 5 people.
